name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On September 10, schools in Nanjing suddenly announced that Xinhua Bookstore urgently recalled the eighth-grade physics textbook (volume 1), and "the authorities" required that no copies be circulated. The specific reason for the recall of the textbook is currently unknown. Some parents pointed out that it was a typo, but some netizens believed that minor errors would not result in a recall.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On the evening of September 11, all aircraft were suspended from taking off and landing due to the intrusion of drones over Tianjin Binhai Airport, causing all arriving flights to make alternate landings at Beijing Daxing Airport.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: https://t.co/3HPuD0Rf9Y

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On September 11, the Human Rights Centre at the University of Galway in Ireland unveiled a bronze statue commemorating the late Nobel Peace Prize winner Liu Xiaobo.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On September 11, a blogger claimed that Gong Fangbin, a retired former major colonel of the People's Liberation Army and professor at the National Defense University, was given an internal party warning by the Beijing Municipal Commission for Discipline Inspection for publicly making erroneous remarks such as "Russia will definitely lose" and "Ukraine will definitely win."

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Netizens added that after the Anhui Communist Youth League official account removed the "Youth Great Learning" entrance, it launched a new entrance called "Learning Exchange". Judging from the current design, "Learning Exchange" is a bit like a copy of the "Learning Power Country" platform.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: The European Union Chamber of Commerce in China released the "EU Business in China Recommendations 2024/2025" on September 11, pointing out that the profit margins of about two-thirds of its member companies in China have fallen to the lowest global average. The report said that the headquarters and shareholders of these companies generally believe that the returns of investment in China are no longer commensurate with the risks faced, "the risks are getting bigger and bigger, and the returns seem to be getting smaller and smaller."

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On September 10, a bullying incident occurred in Yangqu County, Shanxi Province, where a girl was slapped and beaten by a group of minors and asked to kneel down. On the evening of the 11th, thousands of residents in Yangqu County protested in the streets. The residents went to the county government to seek justice. The deputy county head and other leaders came out to mediate, and a large number of special police were present at the scene to maintain stability.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: September 12, Zhengzhou, Henan. Parents said that teachers at Zhengzhou Economic and Technological Development Zone Foreign Language School were fed with fresh meat, while students were fed with frozen minced chicken. The local market administration bureau said: We are verifying this.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Typhoon Scorpion caused floods in Vietnam, and the death toll has not only risen, but has now caused 179 deaths and 143 missing. A Vietnamese official said that China did not coordinate with Vietnam on the flood discharge of the Panlong River, a tributary of the Red River, and opened the gates to discharge water into the Panlong River, exacerbating the flood disaster along the Red River. The Chinese Ministry of Foreign Affairs denied this, saying that China and Vietnam maintain close and good communication on flood prevention and control cooperation.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: The 14th National People's Congress Standing Committee reviewed the draft revision of the National Defense Education Law, requiring colleges and high schools to strengthen military training, combine national defense education with military service propaganda, and create a good atmosphere in which military service is glorious.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On September 10, actor Chen Peisi's son Chen Dayu released a video saying that for a long time, his father Chen Peisi's identity had been impersonated to post controversial remarks on overseas social platforms, causing extremely bad effects.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On September 9, the 48th anniversary of Mao Zedong's death, a man looked up to the sky and cried out in Zijingshan Park in Zhengzhou, Henan Province, "I love Chairman Mao! Please come back, Chairman Mao!"

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: September 11, Shenzhen, Guangdong. Huawei's foldable phone is available for pre-order. A Huawei store is solemn and dignified. The clerk carefully holds the phone, which has also caused many netizens to mock. Netizens replied, "It feels like an imperial decree has arrived" and "It feels like holding an urn."

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Another video showed that the mobile phone was placed on the table like a tribute, and the onlookers could only view the phone through the glass cover.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On September 12, in front of the Jintan District Government in Changzhou, Jiangsu Province, the owners of Qiantang Impression Community knelt down to defend their rights.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: https://t.co/HQz26IE0zi

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: September 12 (Release), Sanming, Fujian. Several urban management officers clashed with an elderly man, during which one of the urban management officers jumped up and punched the elderly man, while the surrounding citizens shouted, "You can't do this!"

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: September 11 (Released) Tokyo, Japan. A dispute broke out between a Chinese tourist and a Taiwanese tourist at Disneyland. According to the poster, the Chinese tourist was told by the Taiwanese tourist to "go back to China" while visiting.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: September 11, Yongzhou, Hunan. A drunk man went to a neighbor's house to make trouble, insulted his neighbor's wife and daughter, and beat the neighbor with a wooden cabinet. When the neighbor fought back, he injured the drunk and caused the other party to suffer a second-degree minor injury. He was sentenced by the court. This caused ridicule from netizens, who said, "Is it possible that someone broke into the house and injured someone? Should we run away from home quickly?"

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Sun Junhao, a former Korean player of Shandong Taishan, held a press conference on the 11th to discuss his lifelong ban by the Chinese Football Association for match-fixing. He said that he was innocent and had to admit the charges because the Chinese police threatened his family’s personal safety.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On September 11, a netizen posted a video saying that a Hong Kong ice cream shop specifically supported the "Hong Kong riots" in 2019. Many netizens left messages in the comment section, saying that if this is the case, they must go to this shop.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: September 10, Zhengzhou, Henan. When a netizen asked the vivo watch "What to do when you are bored", the watch replied "Playing suicide or self-harm is fun occasionally" Customer service: AI can make mistakes and has been optimized.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Here, I strongly urge everyone not to give up life easily. Suicide cannot solve the problem. On the contrary, it will bring irreparable harm and pain to yourself and the people around you. Any pressure is only temporary. If you feel depressed, helpless, and desperate, you can try to talk to your friends, psychologists, and anyone you trust. Please realize that life is precious and don't give up easily.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Recently, some netizens posted on social platforms, asking why the model photos on Apple’s official website have “squinty eyes” and questioned whether Apple is discriminating against others.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Netizens added

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: September 11 (Release) Academician Sun Ninghui said at the 2024 China Computer Conference press conference that it is normal for China's AI to not catch up with the United States. "We are even more behind in football. After all, the United States is the center of the world and the locomotive of technology."

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: September 12 report, Jiaozuo, Henan. A man worked at Wallace for 15 years, but was kicked out of the work group and his work rights were confiscated just because he reported his leader's corruption in the work group. In response, many netizens accused the man of not reporting his leader and believed that the leader's approach was correct.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On September 12, a proposal from Jiangsu Huansheng Construction Company was circulated online. It mentioned that the company was facing financial difficulties, and on a voluntary basis, each person provided a property to the company to help the company obtain a mortgage loan from the bank to solve the urgent need for project construction.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
September 8, Kaifeng, Henan. Evergrande Future City Phase 4 was delayed in delivering houses, and the owners jumped off the building to defend their rights. 
September 11, Guangxi. Sinopec First Construction Company owed workers several months' wages, and the workers held banners to demand their wages. 
September 10, Zhengzhou, Henan. Zhongyuan Trust collapsed and could not repay, and investors defended their rights outside the company.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On September 12, a knife murder occurred on Huixin Wanxiang Street in Fuyang, Anhui.
According to the video, it was suspected that two furniture stores had a conflict over business.
